description: This file declares the public interface for the Telco Voice Manager's network monitor component, including function prototypes and preprocessor directives. It includes conditional dependencies based on feature flags.

methods.name: voicemgr_sysevent_init
methods.description: Initializes system event handling for the Voice Manager network monitor.

methods.name: voicemgr_sysevent_close
methods.description: Closes or releases resources associated with system event handling.

methods.name: voicemgr_create_nw_monitor
methods.description: Creates or sets up the network monitor component.
